our_story.title: Kernel Story
our_story.description:
Once upon a time…

There were financial management problems, tangled and outdated systems, unbearable calculations, and there was no Kernel to get your small business out of it all.

That's why…

In 2019, our small team created Kernel with a big vision in mind: make the life of entrepreneurs and small business owners easier with the help of simple financial tools. That’s why we created our country-specific and straightforward invoicing software solution, which quickly spread from local to international markets.

In the modern world, we believe that small business owners shouldn't spend countless hours on accounting as this time and effort can be spent working on brilliant ideas for growing business.

Not everyone who needs accounting is an accountant. Therefore, using our tools does not require any financial education. Simply anyone can do it.

Do you know what's behind all this? It's Kernel's small but extraordinary team. We provide resources and encourage each team member to develop according to their interests as the success of our company stands on the success of hard-working, motivated individuals

carousel.title: Why Customers Love Us
carousel.description1_georgia: I really like to see that you show interest in customers and you are never hesitant to receive recommendations and remarks
carousel.description2_georgia: I visited your website with high expectations the very first time and once I created my first invoice I knew you were to be trusted
carousel.description3_georgia: It is a very flexible and simple tool. It allows us to manage invoices in one place, which makes our job much easie
carousel.description4_georgia: Kernel allows me to easily control my cash flow. I can create invoices in seconds, which is a great benefit. Also, I read your blog quite frequently and I love it! Please keep on creating the quality content I am learning a lot from you
carousel.description1: The app is super nice when you’re on the go and having to send official invoices to customers right then. The only thing that was bothering me was not being able to see my revenues per customer but I contacted their team and they actually added it after my recommendation! That was super cool really.
carousel.description2: I can't imagine I was spending so much time on actually issuing invoicing by hand when I could have automated most of it here! This is a must for every e-commerce business owner really
carousel.description3: Seriously? Why isn't this more popular?! It literally look me one minute to actually create and download the PDF of my official BIR invoice. And the software saved both information about my business and the customer. SO it's all prefilled now!
carousel.description4: It's the simplicity that kept me coming back. I just love how minimalistic and intuitive their functionality is. Plus their adding new stuff all the time so I'm excited to see where this is going
